text: The 2018 Tallahassee mayoral election took place on August 28 and November 6, 2018, to elect the Mayor of Tallahassee, Florida. Incumbent mayor Andrew Gillum decided to focus his campaign on the 2018 Florida gubernatorial election instead of seeking reelection thus opening a new seat. A blanket primary was held on August 28 with John E. Dailey and Dustin R. Daniels receiving the most votes.https://www.tallahassee.com/story/news/2018/08/28/florida-primary- results-tallahassee-mayor-john-dailey-dustin-daniels-rehwinkel- vasilinda/1087106002/ Because neither the candidate received a majority, a run-off election was held on November 8. Dailey defeated Daniels by a close margin of 51% to 49%.https://www.tallahassee.com/story/news/2018/11/06/john- dailey-wins-tallahassee-mayor-race/1861325002/ == Candidates == === Declared === * John E. Dailey, chairman of the Leon County Commission https://www.talgov.com/cityleadership/dailey.aspx * Dustin R. Daniels, Mayor's chief of staff https://www.tallahassee.com/story/news/2018/04/04/dustin- daniels-mayors-chief-staff-launches-campaign-video/484868002/ * Michelle Rehwinkel Vasilinda, attorney, professor https://ballotpedia.org/Michelle_Rehwinkel_Vasilinda * Carrie Litherland, advocate https://www.tallahassee.com/story/news/2018/05/15/local-mental- health-advocate-decides-run-tallahassee-mayor/607925002/ * Joe West, veteran https://www.ecosia.org/search?q=joe+west+tallahassee * Norris Barr, former employee https://www.tallahassee.com/story/news/2018/08/06/mayoral-and- commission-candidates-share-views/853099002/ === Potential === * Bill Montford, state senator https://www.ecosia.org/search?q=bill+montford === Withdrawn === * Erik David, instructor, veteran https://www.erikmdavid.com * Bob Lotane, communications executive https://tallahasseereports.com/2018/04/15/city-commission-candidate-bob- lotanes-tallahassee-is-no-gotham/ * Gil Ziffer, city commissioner http://gilziffer.com == Results == === First round === === Runoff === ==References== 2018 Category:2018 Florida elections Category:2018 United States mayoral elections
title: 2018 Tallahassee mayoral election
